newsArray.title: Sunil Gavaskar's fiery message to BCCI amid IPL 2024 batting carnages: 'It's not exciting... bowlers are suffering'
newsArray.description: Sunil Gavaskar nearly lost his calm on air as he reckoned that the “bowlers are suffering” amid the rising 200-plus totals in IPL.

newsArray.title: Ligue 1: Memphis Depay explique ce qu'il manque à l'OL pour passer un cap et regagner des titres
newsArray.description: Dans un long entretien accordé à Prime Video, Memphis Depay a raconté qu’il s’était expliqué avec Juninho et Jean-Michel Aulas, les dirigeants lyonnais lorsqu'il y jouait, sur le manque de trophées récents pour un club de cette envergure.

newsArray.title: Messi double keeps Miami on top in MLS
creator: Guardian Nigeria
newsArray.description: Lionel Messi scored twice and created another for Sergio Busquets as Inter Miami beat Nashville 3-1 on Saturday to maintain top spot in Major League Soccer's Eastern Conference. Miami suffered an early setback when their defender Franco Negri deflected a corner from Daniel Lovitz into his own net in just the second minute of the […] The post Messi double keeps Miami on top in MLS appeared first on The Guardian Nigeria News - Nigeria and World News.
